overview:
Luc Tran-Thang has been appointed Vice President â€“ Head of Advertising Business of Orange Group world wide in January 2008. He is also President of the French trade association of the Internet advertising sales houses (Syndicat des RÃ©gies Internet) since 2005, boardmember of EIAA and IAB Europe.

He was previously managing director of the Orange Internet Portal & Services Business Unit until 2007. During this period Orange reached a leading position in France on both the audience side and in the advertising market (ranking NÂ°1 in the internet display market). He had been member of the executive committee of Wanadoo Portals from 2001 until 2003. During this period he has set-up the Internet portal production unit which developped voila.fr and wanadoo.fr.

Before entering France Telecom Group, he was in charge of the International business development in Regie T International (a joint venture of Publicis & France Telecom) and acted as a consultant for Strategy Analysis International.
